# Abandoned Translations.

Thank you for being interested in making Call of Cthulhu 7th Edition for Foundry VTT better! Below is a list of translations keys on existing files that still need translated, based on `en.json`.

[cs.json (157 untranslated strings)](#csjson)

[it.json (195 untranslated strings)](#itjson)

[ko.json (405 untranslated strings)](#kojson)

[pt-BR.json (353 untranslated strings)](#pt-brjson)

[ru.json (275 untranslated strings)](#rujson)

[uk.json (158 untranslated strings)](#ukjson)
